channel.title: TACO
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "TACO" - where Tacos will droped the taco

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: yeah i have never gotten a drop either. ive run EVERYTHING you can to maximize the drop chance. fillers, juice, same team as him, tried with mega for a month then non mega for a month and never 1 drop…

item.title: Re: TACO
item.content:encoded: Bro, u need "4.Themes: FILLERS!" Taco have letter dependent stuff, so the best month for ur choise :) Also use billy con perk for 45th taco per drop :D And btw u can do 2(!) Tue a week! If Mon stam will be used few hours before dayroll (at my city dayroll is about 13:10-13:20 and TACO-Tue became at 8:00, i.e. when 0:00 at Billy, I have +2 but Billy -6 hours line, so I have about 5 bonus hours :) ) which makes dayroll-Tue at BvS, so if u have time, u can try twice :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
never happened, i tried it all this season every tuesday; no drop even once :((

0. Team : The hoclaus + Olmek + taco
1. Mega mission active
2. +120% juice bonus drop
3. +11% Dresden file
4. Themes : stand by your ninja
5. Jutsu : I Need This
6. my stamina = 2k + 10 every mission.
7. AA Rank Mega Mission

item.title: Re: TACO
item.content:encoded:
TACOs will be dropped on any mission type where TACOS (the ally) is not disabled. The drop rarity is unusual in that it changes day by day, month by month. Tuesday is usually the day everyone plans TACO runs, as you'll receive double TACO drops on Tuesdays.

Filler Themes have also been said to be the most useful in boosting drop rates, rather than Stand By Your Ninja.

item.title: TACO
item.content:encoded:

how rare is this taco ?
